channel.title: R on Paul Hook
channel.description: Recent content in R on Paul Hook

item.title: My first blog post!
item.description: Hello! If you haven’t been able to tell by the website already, my name is Paul Hook. I am a fourth year Ph.D. student in the Human Genetics program in the McKusick-Nathans Institute of Genetic Medicine at the Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine. I am in Dr. Andy McCallion’s lab. You can learn alittle bit more about me here, so I won’t go on and on in the inaugural blog post.
